title: Call in the sign police!
content:
Get James Montalbano on the next bus to Montreal before the city switches their signage to ALL CAPS!   
   
 [http://www.canada.com/montreal/montrealgazette/news/story.html?id=0091f03b-d96f-4e38-8be4-3e5811d70067](http://web.archive.org/web/20050826184050/http:/www.canada.com/montreal/montrealgazette/news/story.html?id=0091f03b-d96f-4e38-8be4-3e5811d70067)  
   
Reading typography students may be able to help these 'vandals' fix their letter spacing too...   
   
 [http://www.getreading.co.uk/story.asp?intid=11803](http://web.archive.org/web/20050826184050/http:/www.getreading.co.uk/story.asp?intid=11803)   
   
Cheers, Si
author: sii

comments.content: Si, it's part of a plan to get people out of their cars and switch to riding bikes and walking -- slow down and read the type.
